text:
ant hangs when javadoc run on a large number of packages. The total number 
of .java files in the path is about 400. Running Solaris 2.7 and Sun jdk12207

Have seen the same happen with javac


Buildfile.xml is

<project name="docs" default="staticdocs" basedir=".">
<target name="staticdocs">
<javadoc packagenames="fsu.ais.*"  
sourcepath="/home/webadmin/java/staticsource" 
destdir="/home/aispage/javadocs/apidocs/static" author="true" version="true" 
use="true">
</javadoc>
</target>
</project>
creator: rkaushik@admin.fsu.edu

text:
Please try the new "useexternalfile" attribute to force Javadoc to use an 
external file for the list of files. This overcomes line length limitations
creator: conor@apache.org
